meanings: (어떤 장소에) be, (건물 등이) stand, be located (in/at), be situated, (도시 등이) lie
(시설·장치 등이) have, (시설이) be equipped with, be provided with

vlive.korean: 살아있다니... It's still alive. 듣기 View video 콬TV (WHYNOT) : 💞 고백에 성공하는 법 [김요한 이야기] EP05 해피밤

vlive.korean: 이런 거짓말 같은 컴백을 할 수 있다니... We are making a comeback like a lie (magic). 듣기 View video IZ*ONE : 발매 20분 전♡.♡

vlive.korean: [이걸로 2417지룽과 함께 있을 수 있다니.. (감동] 느낌이 드나요? [I can be with you 2417... (Moved)] Can you feel it? 듣기 View video V PICK! : [YOON JISUNG] 쏘스페셜한 지룽이의 우당탕탕 언박싱🐧📖 (JISUNG’s New album unboxing)

examples.korean: It’s good you can see the funny side of the situation. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 네가 이 상황에서 우스운 측면을 볼 수 있다니 다행이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: It’s good you can see the funny side of the situation. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I’m truly blessed to have such great friends. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그런 훌륭한 친구들이 있다니 나는 진짜로 축복받은 것 같아. DARAKWON
examples.english: I’m truly blessed to have such great friends. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I finally met my ideal type. Too bad she’s taken. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 드디어 내 이상형을 만났어. 남자친구가 있다니 너무 아쉽다. DARAKWON
examples.english: I finally met my ideal type. Too bad she’s taken. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I’m blessed to have such truly good friends. Thanks for always having my back. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 이렇게 정말 좋은 친구들이 있다니 난 축복받았어. 항상 나를 지지해줘서 고마워. DARAKWON
examples.english: I’m blessed to have such truly good friends. Thanks for always having my back. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I know most of us don’t talk as much as we should, but you all mean the world to me and I am the luckiest girl in the world to have such amazing friends and family. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 평소에 이야기를 많이 나누지 못했지만 다들 내겐 정말 소중한 존재야. 이렇게 멋진 친구들과 가족들을 가지고 있다니 나는 정말 세상에서 제일 행복한 애야. DARAKWON
examples.english: I know most of us don’t talk as much as we should, but you all mean the world to me and I am the luckiest girl in the world to have such amazing friends and family. Add to Wordbook
